column2: I've been to the restaurant at least 6-7 times for dinner
column3: lunch and brunch. In the process
column4: I've tried several of the main stays on the menu in addition to the seasonal items and variations--I feel confident that I have a good grasp of the menu as a result. To be fair
column5: there are always one or two stand-out dishes or drinks
column6: but the overall dining experience is consistently flat
